name: Ocean Hopper
description:
Ocean Hopper is a platforming challenge game where you must make your way to the end goal while dodging obstacles. Jump from rock to rock collecting points as you avoid chasing bubbles and race against the ever-speeding camera. Fall into the water, get hit by a bubble, or fall behind the camera and it’s game over!

Move using the W, A, S, D keys and jump using the SPACE  bar!
